author: lundblad
msg: We also need to check errors on fflush calls because of stdio buffering
This is a part of the fix for issue #780.
* clients/cmdline/main.c (main): Use svn_cmdline_fflush before a normal exit.

author: breser
msg: Missing parens cause it to always exit.
